item.description:
Are you happy and at peace with your life today, with where you have been and what you have done so far? Whatever is happening in your life is a result of the choices you make in your thoughts, feelings and actions. These can create peaceful relations with the people and world around you, or chaos and pain. What kind of trail do you want to leave behind you? How can you make changes in your way of being that allows for the trail behind you to be peaceful and life affirming? Come and learn about the realities of karma and how to expand your consciousness so you can make choices that are aligned with goodness and peace.

 

About the Presenter...

Mother Clare Watts is the co-director of a mystical Christian school and Order called the Order of Christ/Sophia. She is an ordained Master Teacher and Priest, holding a Master’s Degree in Counseling Psychology with post-graduate training in Jungian Analysis, and is a Certified Professional Midwife. She is also the author of Giving Birth to God: A Woman's Path To Enlightenment. Watch her on YouTube.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Master Teacher Seminar: Karma: The Trail You Leave Behind You
